title: DormLocator
description: A web application built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase that helps students find dormitories near the university.

title: Coffee Shop Website
description: This website presents menus, promotions, and a contact form. It includes a backend panel for the owner to update content.

title: Tetris Game (Mini Project)
description: A classic Tetris game built with JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas. This project demonstrates my understanding of game loops, collision detection, and key event handling.
